page.title: 02The state of the Church.
page.content: I believe the Christian Churches are holding their own despite great difficulties and interior weaknesses. There is a regular witness of Christ through the area,and some of the individual churches have a splendid record in the field of social responsibility,Christian Education, and personal care.Many of the Church groups are trying to be more outward looking and aware of their neighbours. Many are breaking down barriers of prejudice,and bigotry. More and more Christians feel that they can act together without trying to exploit one another.This means that the community as a whole can obtain a clearer picture of Christian society as it is meant to be.Lay participation is the key to this progress, for the number of ordained or officially appointed ministers is less than ever.
